api_list.name: Get Arrival By Country By Airport_Code_copy
api_list.description: Get arrival data flight by country_code and airport_code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flytrips.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/flight/{country}/arrival/{airport_code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flytrips.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Departures By Country By Airport_Code
api_list.description: Get departure data flight by country_code and airport_code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flytrips.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/flight/{country_code}/arrival/{airport_code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flytrips.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
